title: Textile, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by enrgaved copper plate on plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 282 x 85 cm (9 ft. 3 in. x 33 7/16 in.)
Repeat H: 94 cm (37 in.)
description: Four scenes, one of a mother reading a letter from Nantes to her sons, a cottage scene of parents and children, a picnic during haymaking and a domestic scene with a woman writing or drawing. In sepia on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by enrgaved copper plate on plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-124.
